/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the road, there are trees and bushes, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. Buildings can be seen in the distance, their silhouettes faint against the bright sky. Power lines stretch across the scene, connecting the buildings and adding a sense of depth to the image. The road itself is lined with street lamps, standing like sentinels, ready to illuminate the path as dusk falls. The image is a blend of urban and natural elements, creating a harmonious balance.
